extension.cause: 28:2254 Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus (State)

name.namePart: United States District Court Eastern District of California

extension.cause: 28:2254 Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus (State)

titleInfo.title: (HC) Ximenez v. Department of Corrections
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Craig M. Kellison on 1/3/13 ORDERING that Petitioner shall file a petition on the form employed by this court, and which satisfies the requirements of Rule 2(c) of the Federal Rules Governing Section 2254 Cases, within 30 days of the date of this order; Petitioner shall submit on the form provided by the Clerk of the Court, within 30 days from the date of this order, a complete application for leave to proceed in forma pauperis, with the certification required by Rule 3(a)(2), or pay the appropriate filing fee; and the Clerk of the Court is directed to send petitioner a new form Application to Proceed In Forma Pauperis By a Prisoner; and Clerk of the Court is directed to send petitioner the courts form habeas corpus application.(Dillon, M)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 2:12-cv-03029; (HC) Ximenez v. Department of Corrections;

extension.docketText: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Craig M. Kellison on 1/3/13 ORDERING that Petitioner shall file a petition on the form employed by this court, and which satisfies the requirements of Rule 2(c) of the Federal Rules Governing Section 2254 Cases, within 30 days of the date of this order; Petitioner shall submit on the form provided by the Clerk of the Court, within 30 days from the date of this order, a complete application for leave to proceed in forma pauperis, with the certification required by Rule 3(a)(2), or pay the appropriate filing fee; and the Clerk of the Court is directed to send petitioner a new form Application to Proceed In Forma Pauperis By a Prisoner; and Clerk of the Court is directed to send petitioner the courts form habeas corpus application.(Dillon, M)

titleInfo.title: (HC) Ximenez v. Department of Corrections
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Craig M. Kellison on 2/28/2013 DIRECTING the Clerk to randomly assign a District Judge to this case and to update the docket to reflect the new case number. Assigned to US District Judge Morrison C. England, Jr.; the new case number is 2:12-cv-3029 MCE CMK (HC).(Yin, K)

titleInfo.title: (HC) Ximenez v. Department of Corrections
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Craig M. Kellison on 3/18/13 ORDERING that petitioners motion for appointment of counsel 3 is denied without prejudice to renewal, at the earliest, after a response to the petition has been filed.(Dillon, M)

titleInfo.title: (HC) Ximenez v. Department of Corrections
titleInfo.subTitle: FINDINGS and RECOMMENDATIONS signed by Magistrate Judge Craig M. Kellison on 3/18/13 RECOMMENDING that this action be dismissed, without prejudice, for lack of prosecution and failure to comply with court rules and orders. Referred to Judge Morrison C. England, Jr.; Objections to F&R due within 14 days.(Dillon, M)
